name: Dazzling Blade, Mass
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Rival Guide. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: One metal weapon/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions like dazzling blade, except as noted above and that it affects multiple weapons. Each wielder of a dazzling blade can discharge the weapon's effect to attempt to blind a foe independently of the others.
text_zh: 此法术的效果类似闪耀之刃，但它可以对多件武器产生影响。每位闪耀之刃的持有者可以释放武器的效果，尝试让一名独立于其他人的敌人目盲。
